snippet: Mayor Vincent Gray vetoed a bill that would have forced large retailers in the District of Columbia to pay at least $12.50 an hour.
abstract: District of Columbia Mayor Vincent Gray vetoes bill that would force Wal-Mart Stores and other large retailers to pay their employees at least $12.50 an hour, saying it would not advance goal of providing living wage for city's workers.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Vincent Gray vetoed a bill that would have forced large retailers in the District of Columbia to pay at least $12.50 an hour.

headline.main: Mayor Vetoes Bill to Raise Retail Wages in Washington
headline.print_headline: Mayor Vetoes Bill to Raise Retail Wages In Washington
